00042 // ===========================================================================
00043 // used namespaces

00045 using namespace traci;

00047 
00048 // ===========================================================================
00049 // method definitions
00050 // ===========================================================================
00051 bool
00052 TraCIServerAPI_MeMeDetector::processGet(TraCIServer& server, tcpip::Storage& inputStorage,
00053                                         tcpip::Storage& outputStorage) {
00054     std::string warning = ""; // additional description for response
00055     // variable & id
00056     int variable = inputStorage.readUnsignedByte();
00057     std::string id = inputStorage.readString();
00058     // check variable
00059     if (variable != ID_LIST && variable != LAST_STEP_VEHICLE_NUMBER && variable != LAST_STEP_MEAN_SPEED
00060             && variable != LAST_STEP_VEHICLE_ID_LIST && variable != LAST_STEP_VEHICLE_HALTING_NUMBER
00061             && variable != ID_COUNT) {
00062         server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_GET_MULTI_ENTRY_EXIT_DETECTOR_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Get MeMeDetector Variable: unsupported variable specified", outputStorage);
00063         return false;
00064     }
00065     // begin response building
00066     tcpip::Storage tempMsg;
00067     //  response-code, variableID, objectID
00068     tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(RESPONSE_GET_MULTI_ENTRY_EXIT_DETECTOR_VARIABLE);
00069     tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(variable);
00070     tempMsg.writeString(id);
00071     if (variable == ID_LIST) {
00072         std::vector<std::string> ids;
00073         MSNet::getInstance()->getDetectorControl().getTypedDetectors(SUMO_TAG_ENTRY_EXIT_DETECTOR).insertIDs(ids);
00074         tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRINGLIST);
00075         tempMsg.writeStringList(ids);
00076     } else if (variable == ID_COUNT) {
00077         std::vector<std::string> ids;
00078         MSNet::getInstance()->getDetectorControl().getTypedDetectors(SUMO_TAG_ENTRY_EXIT_DETECTOR).insertIDs(ids);
00079         tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_INTEGER);
00080         tempMsg.writeInt((int) ids.size());
00081     } else {
00082         MSE3Collector* e3 = static_cast<MSE3Collector*>(MSNet::getInstance()->getDetectorControl().getTypedDetectors(SUMO_TAG_ENTRY_EXIT_DETECTOR).get(id));
00083         if (e3 == 0) {
00084             server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_GET_MULTI_ENTRY_EXIT_DETECTOR_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Areal detector '" + id + "' is not known", outputStorage);
00085             return false;
00086         }
00087         switch (variable) {
00088             case ID_LIST:
00089                 break;
00090             case LAST_STEP_VEHICLE_NUMBER:
00091                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_INTEGER);
00092                 tempMsg.writeInt((int) e3->getVehiclesWithin());
00093                 break;
00094             case LAST_STEP_MEAN_SPEED:
00095                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00096                 tempMsg.writeDouble(e3->getCurrentMeanSpeed());
00097                 break;
00098             case LAST_STEP_VEHICLE_ID_LIST: {
00099                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRINGLIST);
00100                 std::vector<std::string> ids = e3->getCurrentVehicleIDs();
00101                 tempMsg.writeStringList(ids);
00102             }
00103             break;
00104             case LAST_STEP_VEHICLE_HALTING_NUMBER:
00105                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_INTEGER);
00106                 tempMsg.writeInt((int) e3->getCurrentHaltingNumber());
00107                 break;
00108             default:
00109                 break;
00110         }
00111     }
00112     server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_GET_MULTI_ENTRY_EXIT_DETECTOR_VARIABLE, RTYPE_OK, warning, outputStorage);
00113     server.writeResponseWithLength(outputStorage, tempMsg);
00114     return true;
00115 }
